title: The Chosen of Shar
content:
face-to-face with a Wolf as Lady Shar saved her and gave her a new home. Shadowheart tells you that she can't remember anything before that vision. With your knowledge, you recall a familiar Selunite rites of passage, about how they would send their children out into the wilds, to navigate their way home. You will get the following options to respond to Shadowheart:

No wonder you're so dedicated to Shar- you feel like you owe your life to her. You looked like you were wearing a Moonstone... is
